sense.gloss: to come off (of a button, handle, lid, etc.)
to go away (of a fever, pain, swelling, etc.), to disappear, to come out (of a stain), to come off (e.g. of dust), to be removed (e.g. of wrinkles)
to be harvested, to be picked, to be produced, to be caught (of fish), to be obtained, to be extracted
to be interpreted (as), to be taken (as), to be understood (as), to be read (as)
to be attained (of balance, harmony, etc.), to be achieved
to be able to get, to be able to obtain, to be able to secure, to be able to win, to be able to catch

sdata.j: あなたは↑今晩↑↓こんばん↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓で↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓が|↑取↑↓と↓れる|。
sdata.e: You can get in touch with him at his home tonight.

sdata.j: ↑皆↑↓みな↓が↑確実↑↓かくじつ↓に↑席↑↓せき↓が|↑取↑↓と↓れる|ように↑早↑↓はや↓めに↑劇場↑↓げきじょう↓に↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: We went to the theater early, so we could be sure that everyone could get a seat.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑確実↑↓かくじつ↓に↑席↑↓せき↓が|↑取↑↓と↓れる|ように↑早↑↓はや↓く↑出↑↓で↓かけた。
sdata.e: We went early to make certain that we could get seats.

sdata.j: よい↑席↑↓せき↓が|↑取↑↓と↓れる|ように↑早↑↓はや↓く↑行↑↓い↓きなさい。
sdata.e: Go early in order to get a good seat.

sdata.j: どうしたら↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓が|↑取↑↓と↓れる|か↑教↑↓おし↓えてください。
sdata.e: Please tell me how I can get in touch with him.

sdata.j: その↑事業↑↓じぎょう↓もやがては↑採算↑↓さいさん↓が|↑取↑↓と↓れる|ようになるだろう。
sdata.e: The business will pay in due course.

sdata.j: きっと↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑電話↑↓でんわ↓で↑連絡↑↓れんらく↓が|↑取↑↓と↓れる|でしょう。
sdata.e: I am sure I can get in touch with him by telephone.

sdata.j: ＪＬ１２３↑便↑↓びん↓の↑荷物↑↓にもつ↓は、どこへ↑行↑↓い↓けば↑受↑↓う↓け|↑取↑↓と↓れる|か↑教↑↓おし↓えてください。
sdata.e: Could you tell me where I can find the baggage for flight JL 123?

sdata.j: ↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓でも↑平均↑↓へいきん↓↑点↑↓てん↓は|↑取↑↓と↓れる|だろう。
sdata.e: At worst, I will get an average mark.

sdata.j: ↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓でも↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は２↑等↑↓とう↓↑賞↑↓しょう↓を|↑取↑↓と↓れる|だろう。
sdata.e: She can get the second prize at worst.
